breadCrumbs.text: Upload  pricing schedules and other documents
Upload your terms and conditions and other documents

title_mcf: Upload your core terms, call-off order form and schedules (terms and conditions)
subtitle1_mcf: You must upload relevant framework terms and conditions in support of the order form and call-off schedules.  For example, relevant call-off schedules. This step is mandatory.
subtitle2_mcf: If you have several files, it is easier to compress them into a zip file and upload them all at once.
title: Upload your terms and conditions
subtitle: You must upload the terms and conditions for your project. This step is mandatory.
subtitle2: information about your organisation and the problem you want to solve
subtitle3: anything else you think would be useful for them to know
filedesc: you can upload multiple files, each no larger than 300mb, to a total of 1GB. Acceptable file formats: csv, doc, docx, jpg, jpeg, kml, ods, odt, pdf, png, ppt, pptx, rdf, rtf, txt, xls, xlsx, xml, zip
subtitle4: Use the same link (above) to upload any other supporting documents (optional).
subtitle5_mcf: Upload core terms, call-off order form and schedules (mandatory)
subtitle6: You can upload multiple files, each no larger than 300mb, to a total of 1GB.  Acceptable file formats: csv, doc, docx, jpg, jpeg, kml, ods, odt, pdf, png, ppt, pptx, rdf, rtf, txt, xls, xlsx, xml, zip
